hero.title: Plan Your Dream Trip with AI-Powered Recommendations
hero.subtitle: Discover personalized itineraries and local insights.

about.title: Revolutionizing Adventure Travel
about.description: At WanderWise.ai, we believe everyone deserves to experience the perfect adventure. Our mission is to combine artificial intelligence with human expertise to create personalized travel experiences that inspire, challenge, and transform.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the world's most trusted AI-powered travel companion, making outdoor adventures accessible and memorable for everyone.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Innovation, sustainability, and authenticity guide everything we do. We're committed to preserving the natural world while helping people explore it.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: We've helped thousands of travelers discover their perfect trails while promoting responsible tourism and supporting local communities.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2023, WanderWise.ai emerged from a simple observation: while travel planning tools were abundant, none truly understood the individual needs and aspirations of adventure seekers.
story.paragraph2: Our founder, Alexandra Chen, experienced this firsthand during her years of solo travel. Despite extensive research, she often found herself on trails that didn't match her skill level or preferences.
story.paragraph3: Combining her expertise in AI with her passion for outdoor adventures, she assembled a team of technology experts and seasoned travelers to create WanderWise.ai - a platform that understands not just where you want to go, but why you want to go there.
